00043 #define PCI_BA_CSR  0 /* surely there's an official def ?? WORKTODO */
00044 #define CSR_SIZE    0x80
00045 #define CSR_SIZE_MAX 0x1000
00046 
00047 static int acq200_makeIoMapping(
00048         struct Acq200Device* device, int bar, const char* ident, int len)
00049 // return 0 on success
00050 {
00051 #define BA_MASK PCI_BASE_ADDRESS_MEM_MASK
00052         struct IoMapping* pim = &device->csr;
00053         int rc = 0;
00054 
00055         snprintf(pim->name, sizeof(pim->name), "%s.%s", 
00056                  device->ldev.drv_name, ident);
00057 
00058         pim->pa = pci_resource_start(device->pci_dev, bar)&BA_MASK;
00059         pim->len = len;
00060     
00061         dbg(1, "request_mem_region 0x%08lx %d %s\n", 
00062                 pim->pa, pim->len, pim->name );
00063 
00064         if ( request_mem_region( pim->pa, pim->len, pim->name ) != 0 ){
00065                 pim->va = ioremap_nocache( pim->pa, pim->len );
00066                 dbg(1, "ioremap_nocache pa: 0x%08lx len: 0x%02x va: 0x%p", 
00067                     pim->pa, pim->len, pim->va);
00068         }else{
00069                 dbg( 1, "request_mem_region( 0x%08lx, %d, %s ) failed\n",
00070                             pim->pa, pim->len, pim->name );
00071                 rc = -ENODEV;
00072         }
00073 
00074         return rc;
00075 }
00076 
00077 
00078 int acq200_map_pci_memory(struct Acq200Device* device)
00082 {
00083     int rc = 0;                /* assume success until fail */
00084     
00085     if ( (rc = acq200_makeIoMapping( device, PCI_BA_CSR, "csr", CSR_SIZE)) != 0 ){
00086         return rc;
00087     }
00088     return rc;
00089 }
00090 
00091 static void clearIoMapping(struct IoMapping* iomap)
00092 {
00093     if (iomap->va){
00094         iounmap(iomap->va);
00095     }
00096     if (strlen( iomap->name ) ){
00097         release_mem_region(iomap->pa, iomap->len);
00098     }
00099     memset( iomap, 0, sizeof(struct IoMapping));     
00100 }
00101 
00102 void acq200_unmap_pci_memory( struct Acq200Device* device )
00106 {
00107     clearIoMapping(&device->csr);
00108 }

00111 static inline int getDirectionFromVma(struct vm_area_struct *vma)
00112 {
00113         int direction;
00114 /* 
00115  * VM_READ: client wants to READ the MAPPING, DMA fills it FROM_DEVICE
00116  * VM_WRITE, client wants to WRITE the MAPPING, DMA write TO_DEVICE
00117  */
00118         switch(vma->vm_flags&(VM_READ|VM_WRITE)){
00119         case VM_READ|VM_WRITE:
00120                 direction = DMA_BIDIRECTIONAL;
00121                 break;
00122         case VM_READ:
00123                 direction = DMA_FROM_DEVICE;
00124                 break;
00125         case VM_WRITE:
00126                 direction = DMA_TO_DEVICE;
00127                 break;
00128         default:
00129                 direction = DMA_NONE;
00130                 break;          
00131         }
00132         return direction;
00133 }
00134 
00135 
00136 static int mmap_dmabuf(
00137                 struct file* file, struct vm_area_struct* vma,
00138                 struct DmaBuf *dma_buf, char id)
00139 {
00140         unsigned long vsize = vma->vm_end - vma->vm_start;
00141         unsigned long psize = dma_buf_len(dma_buf);
00142         unsigned pfn = dma_buf->pa >> PAGE_SHIFT;
00143 
00144         dbg(1, "%c vsize %lu psize %lu %s",
00145                 id, vsize, psize, vsize>psize? "EINVAL": "OK");
00146 
00147         if (vsize > psize){
00148                 return -EINVAL;                   /* request too big */
00149         }
00150         if (remap_pfn_range(
00151                 vma, vma->vm_start, pfn, vsize, vma->vm_page_prot)){
00152                 STATUS;
00153                 return -EAGAIN;
00154         }else{
00155                 STATUS;
00156                 return 0;
00157         }
00158 }
00159 int acq200_mmap_host(struct file* file, struct vm_area_struct* vma)
00163 {
00164         return mmap_dmabuf(file, vma, &PD(vma->vm_file)->dma_buf, 'D');
00165 }
00166 
00167 int acq200_mmap_llhost(struct file* file, struct vm_area_struct* vma)
00171 {
00172         return mmap_dmabuf(file, vma, &PD(vma->vm_file)->llhost_dma_buf, 'L');
00173 }
00174 
00175 int acq200_mmapAB(struct file* file, struct vm_area_struct* vma)
00179 {
00180         struct Acq200Device* device = DEV(file);
00181         int ibuf = PD(file)->minor&1;
00182         struct DmaBuf *dma_buf = &device->AB[ibuf];
00183 
00184         return mmap_dmabuf(file, vma, dma_buf, ibuf? 'B': 'A');
00185 }
00186 
00187 int acq200_mmap_mbox(struct file* file, struct vm_area_struct* vma)
00191 {
00192         struct Acq200Device* device = DEV(file);
00193         unsigned long off = vma->vm_pgoff << PAGE_SHIFT;
00194         unsigned long pa  = device->csr.pa + off;
00195         unsigned pfn = pa >> PAGE_SHIFT;
00196         unsigned long vsize = vma->vm_end - vma->vm_start;
00197         unsigned long psize = CSR_SIZE_MAX;
00198 
00199         STATUS;
00200 
00201         if (vsize > psize){
00202                 return -EINVAL;                   /* request too big */
00203         }
00204         if (remap_pfn_range(
00205                 vma, vma->vm_start, pfn, vsize, vma->vm_page_prot)){
00206                 STATUS;
00207                 return -EAGAIN;
00208         }else{
00209                 STATUS;
00210                 return 0;
00211         }
00212 }
